SA15dhkprvku:10: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units, although they
SA15dhkprvku:11: involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words are
SA15dhkprvku:12: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
SA15dhkprvku:13: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
SA15dhkprvku:15: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to
SA15dhkprvku:17: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes
SA15dhkprvku:18: making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided, and terms
SA15dhkprvku:19: such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
SA15dhkprvku:20: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta fundamentally
SA15dhkprvku:22: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the
SA15dhkprvku:23: wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya, tadutpatti,
SA15dhkprvku:24: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
SA15dhkprvku:25: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
SA15dhkprvku:26: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
SA15dhkprvku:29: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example, -d
SA15dhkprvku:30: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of

SA15dhkprvku:398: nityaṃ sattvam asattvaṃ vā ahetor anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:399: taikṣṇya-ādīnāṃ yathā na asti kāraṇaṃ kaṇḍaka-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:400: tathā akāraṇam etat syād iti kecit pracakṣate
SA15dhkprvku:401: saty eva yasmin yaj janma vikāre vā api vikriyā
SA15dhkprvku:402: tat tasya kāraṇaṃ prāhus tat teṣām api vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:404: nityānāṃ pratiṣedhena na īśvara-ādeś ca sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:408: yato api prāṇinaḥ kāma-vibhava-icche ca te mate
SA15dhkprvku:414: imān tu yuktiman vicchan bādhate sva-mataṃ svayam
SA15dhkprvku:416: sabhāga-jāteḥ prāk siddhiḥ kāraṇatve api na uditam
SA15dhkprvku:417: ajñānam uktā tṛṣṇā eva santāna-preraṇād bhave
SA15dhkprvku:418: ānantaryān na karma api sati tasminn asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:421: yāvad ātmani na premṇo hāniḥ sa paritasyati
SA15dhkprvku:422: tāvad duḥkhitam āropya na ca svastho avatiṣṭhate
SA15dhkprvku:431: mohaś ca mūlaṃ doṣāṇāṃ sa ca sattva-graho vinā
SA15dhkprvku:432: tena ādya-hetau na dveṣo na doṣo ataḥ kṛpā matā
SA15dhkprvku:434: akṣīṇa-śaktiḥ saṃskāro yeṣāṃ tiṣṭhanti te anaghāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:435: mandatvāt karuṇāyāś ca na yatnaḥ sthāpane mahān
SA15dhkprvku:436: tiṣṭhanty eva para-adhīnāḥ yeṣāṃ tu mahatī kṛpā
SA15dhkprvku:437: satkāyadṛṣṭer vigamād ādya eva abhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:438: mārge cet sahaja-ahāner na hānau vā bhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:439: sukhī bhave ayaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvam iti tṛṣyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:440: yā eva aham iti dhīḥ sā eva sahajaṃ sattva-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:441: na hy apaśyann aham iti snihyaty ātmani kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:442: na ca ātmani vinā premṇā sukha-kāmo abhidhāvati
SA15dhkprvku:443: duḥkha-utpādasya hetutvaṃ bandho nityasya tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:445: anityatvena yo avācyaḥ sa heturn na hi kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:446: bandha-mokṣāv avācye api na vidyete kathaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:447: nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃso yaḥ svabhāvo na naśyati
SA15dhkprvku:448: tyaktvā imāṃ hrepaṇīṃ dṛṣṭim ato nityaḥ sa ucyatām
SA15dhkprvku:449: ukto mārgasya tad abhyāsād āśrayaḥ parivartate
SA15dhkprvku:450: sātmye api doṣa-bhāvaś cen mārgavan na avibhutvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:451: viṣaya-grahaṇaṃ dharmo vijñānasya yathā asti saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:452: gṛhyate so asya janako vidyamāna-ātmanā iti ca
SA15dhkprvku:453: eṣā prakṛtir asyās tan nimitta-antarataḥ skhalat
SA15dhkprvku:455: prabhāsvaram idaṃ cittaṃ prakṛtyā āgantavo malāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:456: tat-prāg apy asamarthānāṃ paścāc śaktiḥ kva tanmaye
SA15dhkprvku:457: na alaṃ praroḍhum atyantaṃ syandinyām agni-vad bhuvi
SA15dhkprvku:460: na bādhā yatnavattve api buddhes tat pakṣa-pātataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:462: rāga-pratighayor bādhā bhede api na parasparam
SA15dhkprvku:464: tan-mūlāś ca malāḥ sarve sa ca satkāyadarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:467: vyākhyeyo atra virodho yas tad-virodhāc ca tanmayaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:472: sa ātmatvena anapāyatvād anekāntāc ca bhasma-vat
SA15dhkprvku:473: yaḥ paśyaty ātmānaṃ tatra aham iti śāśvataḥ snehaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:474: snehāt sukheṣu tṛṣyati tṛṣṇā doṣāṃs tiraskurute
SA15dhkprvku:475: guṇa-darśī paritṛṣyan mama iti tat sādhanāny upādatte
SA15dhkprvku:476: tena ātma-abhiniveśo yāvat tāvat sa saṃsāre
SA15dhkprvku:479: niyamena ātmani snihyaṃs tadīye na virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:480: na ca asty ātmani nirdoṣe sneha-apagama-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:481: snehaḥ sadoṣa iti cet tataḥ kiṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:482: adūṣite asya viṣaye na śakyaṃ tasya varjanam
SA15dhkprvku:484: tayor adṛṣṭir viṣaye na tu bāhyeṣu yaḥ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:485: na hi sneha-guṇāt snehaḥ kiṃ tv artha-guṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:486: kāraṇe avikale tasmin kāryaṃ kena nivāryate
SA15dhkprvku:487: kā vā sadoṣatā dṛṣṭā snehe duḥkha-samāśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:488: tathā api na virāgo atra svatva-dṛṣṭer yathā ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:489: na tair vinā duḥkha-hetur ātmā cet te api tādṛśāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:490: nirdoṣaṃ dvayam apy evaṃ vairāgyaṃ na dvayos tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:492: ātmīya-buddhi-hānyā atra tyāgo na tu viparyaye
SA15dhkprvku:494: svatva-dhīḥ kena vāryeta vairāgyaṃ tatra tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:496: cyuteṣu sā ghṛṇā buddhir jāyate anyatra saspṛhā
SA15dhkprvku:498: sambandhaḥ sa tathā eva iti dṛṣṭāv api na hīyate
SA15dhkprvku:500: duḥkha-upakārān na bhaved aṅgulyām iva cet sva-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:501: na hy ekāntena tad duḥkhaṃ bhūyasā saviṣa-anna-vat
SA15dhkprvku:506: yasya ātmā vallabhaḥ tasya sa nāśaṃ katham icchati
SA15dhkprvku:508: icchet prema kathaṃ premṇaḥ prakṛtir na hi tādṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:509: sarvathā ātma-grahaḥ sneham ātmani draḍhayaty alam
SA15dhkprvku:512: vṛttimān pratibadhnāti tad doṣān saṃvṛnoti ca
SA15dhkprvku:513: ātmany api virāgaś cet na idānīṃ yo virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:514: tyajaty asau yathā ātmānaṃ vyarthā ato duḥkha-bhāvanā
SA15dhkprvku:515: duḥkha-bhāvanayā apy eṣa duḥkham eva vibhāvayet
SA15dhkprvku:516: pratyakṣaṃ pūrvam api tat tathā api na virāgavān
SA15dhkprvku:517: yady apy ekatra doṣeṇa tat kṣaṇaṃ calitā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:518: viraktau na eva tatra api kāmi iva vanita-antare
SA15dhkprvku:519: tyājya-upādeya-bhede hi saktir yā eva eka-bhāvinī
SA15dhkprvku:522: etāvad eva ca jagat kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:523: sadoṣatā api cet tatra tasya tatra ātmany api sā samā
SA15dhkprvku:524: tatra aviraktas tad-doṣe kva idānīṃ sa virajyate
SA15dhkprvku:526: sa ca indriya-ādau na tv evaṃ bāla-āder api darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:527: doṣavaty api sadbhāvāt svabhāvād guṇavaty api
SA15dhkprvku:529: tata eva ca na ātmīya-buddher api guṇa-īkṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:530: kāraṇaṃ hīyate sa api tasmān na aguṇa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:531: api ca asad guṇa-āropaḥ snehāt tatra hi dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:532: tasmāt ta kāraṇā bādhī vidhis taṃ bādhate katham
SA15dhkprvku:534: indriya-ādeḥ pṛthag bhūtam ātmānaṃ vetty ayaṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:535: tasmān na ekatva-dṛṣṭyā api snehaḥ snihyan sa ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:537: pratyutpannā tu yo duḥkhān nirvedo dveṣa īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:538: na vairāgyaṃ tadā apy asya sneho avasthā-antar eṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:540: tasminn nivṛtte prakṛtiṃ svām eva bhajate punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:544: sā ca naḥ pratyaya-utpattiḥ sā nairātmya-dṛg-āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:546: anityāt prāha tena eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhān nirātmatām
SA15dhkprvku:548: so amuktaḥ kleśa-karmabhyāṃ saṃsārī nāma tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:549: ātmīyam eva yo na icched bhoktā apy asya na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:550: ātmā api na tadā tasya kriyā-bhogau hi lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:555: na alaṃ bīja-ādi-saṃsiddho vidhiḥ puṃsām ajanmane
SA15dhkprvku:557: prāg guror lāghavāt paścān na pāpa-haraṇaṃ kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:558: mā bhūt gauravam eva asya na pāpaṃ gurv-amūrtitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:560: hīna-sthāna-gatir janma tena tacchin na jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:561: tayor eva hi sāmarthyaṃ jātau tan-mātra-bhavataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:562: te cetane svayaṃ karma ity akhaṇḍaṃ janma-kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:564: adṛṣṭa-nāśād agatis tat saṃskāro na cetanā
SA15dhkprvku:566: dṛṣṭaṃ buddhern na ca anyasya tāni santi na santi kim
SA15dhkprvku:568: na syus teṣām asāmarthye tasya dīkṣā-ādy-anantaram
SA15dhkprvku:569: atha buddhes tadā abhāvān na syuḥ sandhīyate malaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:570: buddhes teṣām asāmarthye jīvato api syur akṣamāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:574: kriyāyām akriyāyāṃ ca kriyā ca sadṛśa-ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:575: aikyaṃ ca hetu-phalayor vyatireke tatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:576: kartṛ-bhoktṛtva-hāniḥ syāt sāmarthyaṃ ca na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:578: asmṛteḥ kasyacit tena hy anubhūteḥ smṛta-udbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:579: sthiraṃ sukhaṃ mama ahaṃ ca ity ādi satya-catuṣṭaye
SA15dhkprvku:582: hanti sā anucarāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ samyag-dṛṣṭiḥ subhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:583: tri-hetorn na udbhavaḥ karma-dehayoḥ sthitayor api
SA15dhkprvku:584: eka-abhāvād vinā bījaṃ na aṅkurasya iva janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:586: aśakyatvāc ca tṛṣṇāyāṃ sthitāyāṃ punar udbhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:587: dvaya-kṣaya-arthaṃ yatne ca vyarthaḥ karma-kṣaye śramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:589: karmaṇāṃ tāpa-saṃkleśāt na eka-rūpāt tataḥ kṣayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:590: phalaṃ kathaṃcit taj-janyam alpaṃ syān na vijātimat
SA15dhkprvku:593: yadi iṣṭam aparaṃ kleśāt tat tapaḥ kleśa eva cet
SA15dhkprvku:594: tat karma-phalam ity asmān na śakteḥ saṃkara-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:596: tajje karmaṇi śaktāḥ syuḥ kṛta-hāniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:597: doṣā na karmaṇo duṣṭaḥ karoti na viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:598: mithyā-vikalpena vinā na abhilāṣaḥ sukhād api
SA15dhkprvku:603: dayayā śreya ācaṣṭe jñānāt satyaṃ sasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:604: tac ca abhiyogavān vaktuṃ yatas tasmāt pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:607: prayoga-darśanād vā asya yat kiṃcid udaya-ātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:608: nirodha-dharmakaṃ sarvaṃ tad ity ādāv anekadhā
SA15dhkprvku:610: vyāpti-pradarśanād hetoḥ sādhyena uktaṃ ca tat sphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:617: aśaktaṃ sarvam iti ced bīja-āder aṅkura-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:618: dṛṣṭā śaktiḥ matā sā cet saṃvṛtyā astu yathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:619: sā asti sarvatra ced buddher na anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:624: jñeyatvena grahād doṣo na abhāveṣu prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:626: jñāna-rūpatayā arthatvāt keśa-ādi iti matiḥ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:634: sārūpyād bhrāntito vṛttir arthe cet syān na sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:635: deśa-bhrāntiś ca na jñāne tulyam utpattito dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:642: ajñātasya svayaṃ jñānān nāma-ādy etena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:643: sā eva iṣṭa-arthavatī kena cakṣur-ādi-matir matā
SA15dhkprvku:646: atīta-anāgataṃ vācyaṃ na syād arthena tat kṣayāt
SA15dhkprvku:648: tan na kevala-sāmānya-agrahaṇād grahaṇe api vā
SA15dhkprvku:650: nityatvāc ca yadi vyaktir vyakteḥ pratyakṣatāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:651: ātmani jñāna-janane yac śaktaṃ śaktam eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:652: atha aśaktaṃ kadācic ced aśaktaṃ sarvadā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:653: tasya śaktir aśaktir vā yā svabhāvena saṃsthitā
SA15dhkprvku:654: nityatvād acikitsyasya kas tāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:656: nīla-ādy-ākāra-leśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:657: pratyakṣa-pratyaya-arthatvān na akṣāṇāṃ vyarthatā iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:658: sā eva eka-rūpāc śabda-āder bhinna-ābhāsā matiḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:659: na jātir jātimad vyakti-rūpaṃ yena apara-āśrayam
SA15dhkprvku:660: siddhaṃ pṛthak cet kāryatvaṃ hy apekṣā ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:663: anyatve tad asambaddhaṃ siddhā ato niḥsvabhāvatā
SA15dhkprvku:664: jāti-prasaṅgo abhāvasya na apekṣā abhāvatas tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:667: tasyāṃ rūpa-avabhāso yas tattvena arthasya vā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:670: yan niṣṭhās ta ime śabdā na rūpaṃ tasya kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:672: artha-bhrāntir api iṣyeta sāmānyaṃ sā apy abhiplavāt
SA15dhkprvku:673: artha-rūpatayā tattvena abhāvāc ca na rūpiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:675: yadi vastu na vastūnām avācyatvaṃ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:679: upacārāt tad iṣṭaṃ ced vartamāna-ghaṭasya kā
SA15dhkprvku:680: pratyāsattir abhāvena yā paṭa-ādau na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:682: siṃhe māṇavake tadvad ghoṣaṇā apy asti laukikī
SA15dhkprvku:683: yatra rūḍhyā asad-artho api janaiḥ śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:684: sa mukhyas tatra tat-sāmyād gauṇo anyatra skhalad gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:685: yathābhāve apy abhāva-ākhyāṃ yathā-kalpanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:686: kuryād aśakte śakte vā pradhāna-ādi-śrutiṃ janaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:687: śabdebhyo yādṛśī buddhir naṣṭe anaṣṭe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:688: tādṛśy eva sad-arthānāṃ na etac śrotṛ-ādi-cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:690: tasya api kevalasya prāg grahaṇaṃ vinivāritam
SA15dhkprvku:692: rūpaṃ dvirūpatāyāṃ vā tad-vastv ekaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:693: tābhyāṃ tad-anyad eva syād yadi rūpaṃ samaṃ tayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:694: tayor iti na sambandho vyāvṛttis tu na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:695: tasmāt samānatā eva asmin sāmānye avastu-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:696: kāryaṃ ca tad anekaṃ syān naśvaraṃ ca tan-matam
SA15dhkprvku:699: yac ca vastu-balāj jñānaṃ jāyate tad apekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:700: na saṃketaṃ na sāmānya-buddhiṣv etad vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:701: yā apy abheda-anugā buddhiḥ kācid vastu-dvaye kṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:704: jñāna-kāryeṣu jātir vā yayā anveti vibhāgataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:706: yadi nāma indriyāṇāṃ syād draṣṭā bhāseta tad-vapuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:708: vyakti-grahe ca tac śabda-rūpād anyan na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:710: tad ayogyatayā arūpaṃ tad hy avastuṣu lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:714: na ukta-uttaratvād dṛṣṭatvād atīta-ādiṣu ca anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:716: taj-jñānam ity adoṣo ayaṃ meyaṃ tv ekaṃ svalakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:720: gatiś cet pararūpeṇa na ca bhrānteḥ pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:722: gatir apy anyathā dṛṣṭā pakṣaś ca ayaṃ kṛta-uttaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:728: tasya svatantraṃ grahaṇam ato anyad vastv atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:730: tad-āśrayeṇa sambandhī yadi syād gamakas tadā
SA15dhkprvku:732: tasmāt sarvaḥ parokṣo artho viśeṣeṇa na gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:733: yā ca sambandhino dharmād gatir dharmiṇi jāyate
SA15dhkprvku:734: sā anumānaṃ parokṣāṇām ekaṃ tena eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:738: ekam eva aprameyatvād asataś cen mataṃ ca naḥ
SA15dhkprvku:740: tan niścaya-pramāṇaṃ vā dvitīyaṃ na akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:743: abhāve vinivṛttiś cet pratyakṣasya eva niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:744: viruddhaṃ sā eva vā liṅgam anvaya-vyatirekiṇī
SA15dhkprvku:748: na āśvāsa iti cel liṅgaṃ durdṛṣṭer atad īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:749: yataḥ kadācit siddhā asya pratītir vastunaḥ kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:750: tad avaśyaṃ tato jātaṃ tat svabhāvo api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:751: sva-nimittaṃ svabhāvaṃ vā vinā na arthasya sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:752: yac ca rūpaṃ tayor dṛṣṭaṃ tad eva anyatra lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:754: anyeṣu satsv adṛśye ca sattā vā tadvataḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:757: tac ca na indriya-śakty-ādāv akṣa-buddher asambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:760: vikalpena na sāmānya-grahas tasmiṃs tato anumā
SA15dhkprvku:762: pramāṇam anyat tad buddhir vinā liṅgena sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:764: tat pramāṇa-antaraṃ meya-bahutvād bahutā api vā
SA15dhkprvku:765: pramāṇānām anekasya vṛtter ekatra vā yathā
SA15dhkprvku:768: yojanād varṇa-sāmānye na ayaṃ doṣaḥ prasajyeta
SA15dhkprvku:769: na avastu rūpaṃ tasya eva tathā siddhe prasādhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:770: anyatra na anya-siddhiś cen na tasya eva prasiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:771: yo hi bhāvo yathābhūto sa tādṛg liṅga-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:772: hetus tajjā tathābhūte tasmād vastuni liṅgi-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:778: nimittaṃ tat svabhāvo vā kāraṇaṃ tac ca tad dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:780: siddhiṃ pramāṇair vadatām arthād eva viparyayāt
SA15dhkprvku:782: niṣedhe yā api tasya eva sā apramāṇatva-sūcanā
SA15dhkprvku:783: anyathā ekasya bhāvasya sadbhāva-uktyā parasya tat
SA15dhkprvku:784: na astitvaṃ kena gamyeta virodhāc ced asāv api
SA15dhkprvku:785: siddhaḥ kena asahasthānād iti cet tat kuto matam
SA15dhkprvku:786: dṛśyasya darśana-abhāvād iti cet sā apramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:787: tasmāt sva-śabdena uktā api sā abhāvasya prasādhikā
SA15dhkprvku:788: yasyā pramāṇaṃ sā avācyo niṣedhas tena sarvathā
SA15dhkprvku:790: prayogaḥ kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ sarvatra artho na bhidyate
SA15dhkprvku:791: viruddhaṃ tac ca sā upāyam avidhāyā api dhāya ca
SA15dhkprvku:792: pramāṇa-uktir niṣedhe yā na sā nyāyānusāriṇī
SA15dhkprvku:796: tādṛśo anupalabdheś ced ucyatāṃ sā eva sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:799: bhinno abhinno api vā dharmaḥ sa viruddhaḥ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:800: yathā agnir ahime sādhye sattā vā janma-bādhanī
SA15dhkprvku:801: yathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sādhane sādhanaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:802: tathā vastv eva vastūnāṃ sva-nivṛttau nivartakam
SA15dhkprvku:805: tatra api vyāpako dharmo nivṛtter gamako mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:807: yad apramāṇatā abhāve liṅgaṃ tasya eva kathyate
SA15dhkprvku:810: tac ca hetau svabhāve vā adṛśye dṛśyatayā mate
SA15dhkprvku:811: anumānād anitya-āder grahaṇe ayaṃ kramo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:812: prāmāṇyam eva na anyatra gṛhīta-grahaṇān matam
SA15dhkprvku:813: na anyās yā anityatā bhāvāt pūrva-siddhaḥ sa ca indriyāt
SA15dhkprvku:814: na aneka-rūpo vācyo asau vācyo dharmo vikalpajaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:816: tad-asiddhau tathā asya eva hy anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:826: buddhayo arthe pravartante abhinne bhinna-āśrayā iva
SA15dhkprvku:827: yathā-codanam ākhyāś ca so asati bhrānti-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:829: siddho atra apy athavā dhvaṃso liṅgād anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:830: prāg bhūtvā hy abhavad bhāvo anitya ity abhidhīyate
SA15dhkprvku:832: anityatā śrutis tena tāvantāv iti kau smṛtau
SA15dhkprvku:833: prāk paścād apy abhāvaś cet sa eva anityatā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:834: ṣaṣṭhy-ādy-ayogād iti ced antayoḥ sa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:836: aviśeṣaṇam eva syād antau cet kārya-kāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:837: asambandhān na bhāvasya prāg-abhāvaṃ sa vāñchati
SA15dhkprvku:838: tad-upādhi-samākhyāne te apy asya ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:840: sā sattā sa ca sambandho nityau kāryam atha iha kim
SA15dhkprvku:841: yasya abhāvaḥ kriyeta asau na bhāvaḥ prāg-abhāvavān
SA15dhkprvku:847: nidarśanaṃ tad eva iti sāmānya-agrahaṇaṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:848: nidarśanatvāt siddhasya pramāṇena asya kiṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:849: vismṛtatvād adoṣaś cet tad eva anidarśanam
SA15dhkprvku:853: sandhīyamānaṃ ca anyena vyavasāyaṃ smṛtiṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:854: tal-liṅga-apekṣaṇān no cet smṛtir na vyabhicārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:858: sthito api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate sā akṣajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:859: punar vikalpayan kiṃcid āsīn me kalpanā īdṛśī
SA15dhkprvku:860: icchā ca iti na pūrva-ukta-avasthāyām indriyād gatau
SA15dhkprvku:861: ekatra dṛṣṭo bhedo hi kvacin na anyatra dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:862: na tasmāt bhinnam asty anyat sāmānyaṃ buddhy-abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:863: tasmād viśeṣa-viṣayā sarvā eva indriyajā matiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:866: viṣayo yaś ca śabdānāṃ saṃyojyeta sa eva taiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:867: asya idam iti sambandhe yāv arthau pratibhāsinau
SA15dhkprvku:868: tayor eva hi sambandho na tadā indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:871: cakṣuṣo artha-avabhāse api yaṃ paro asya iti śaṃsati
SA15dhkprvku:872: sa eva yojyate śabdairn na khalv indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:876: vimūḍho laghuvṛtter vā tayor aikyaṃ vyayasyati
SA15dhkprvku:878: iti ced bhinna-jātīya-vikalpe anyasya vā katham
SA15dhkprvku:880: anyatra api samānaṃ tad varṇayor vā sakṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:881: sakṛt saṃgata-sarva-artheṣv indriyeṣv iha satsv api
SA15dhkprvku:882: pañcabhir vyavadhāne api bhāty avyavahita iva yā
SA15dhkprvku:884: vicchinna-ābhā iti tac citraṃ tasmāt santu sakṛd dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:886: śuddhe mano-vikalpe ca na krama-grahaṇam bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:887: yo agrahaḥ saṃgate apy arthe kvacid āsakta-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:888: saktyā anya-utpatti-vaiguṇyāc codyaṃ vā etad dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:890: cakra-bhrāntiṃ dṛśā dhatte na dṛśāṃ ghaṭanena sā
SA15dhkprvku:892: āhur bālā vikalpe ca hetuṃ saṃketa-mandatām
SA15dhkprvku:893: teṣāṃ pratyakṣam eva syād bālānām avikalpanāt
SA15dhkprvku:894: saṃketa-upāya-vigamāt paścād api bhaven na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:895: mano avyutpanna-saṃketam asti tena sa cen mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:896: evam indriyaje api syād śeṣavac ca idam īdṛśam
SA15dhkprvku:897: yad eva sādhanaṃ bāle tad eva atra api kathyatām
SA15dhkprvku:899: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca sambandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim
SA15dhkprvku:900: gṛhītvā saṃkalayya etat tathā pratyeti na anyathā
SA15dhkprvku:902: tadvatā yojanā na asti kalpanā apy atra na asty ataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:903: yady apy anvayi vijñānaṃ śabda-vyakty-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:905: samānatve api tasya eva na īkṣaṇaṃ netra-gocaram
SA15dhkprvku:908: paṭas tantuṣv iha ity ādi-śabdāś ca ime svayaṃ kṛtāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:909: śṛṅgaṅ gavi iti loke syāc śṛṅge gaur ity alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:911: tais tantubhir iyaṃ śāṭi ity uttaraṃ kāryam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:914: tantv-ākhyāṃ vartayet kārye darśayan na āśrayaṃ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:917: anumānaṃ ca jāty-ādau vastuno na asti bhedini
SA15dhkprvku:918: sarvatra vyapadeśo hi daṇḍa-āder api sāṃvṛtāt
SA15dhkprvku:920: geho yady api saṃyogas tan mālā kiṃ nu tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:921: jātiś ced geha eko api mālā ity ucyeta vṛkṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:922: mālā-bahutve tac śabdaḥ kathaṃ jāter ajātitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:923: mālā-ādau ca mahattva-ādir iṣṭo yaś ca aupacārikaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:926: padārtha-śabdaḥ kaṃ hetum anyaṃ ṣaṭkaṃ samīkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:927: yo yathā rūḍhitaḥ siddhas tat-sāmya-ādyas tathā ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:928: mukhyo gauṇaś ca bhāveṣv apy abhāvasya upacārataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:929: saṃketa-anvayinī rūḍhir vaktur icchā anvayī ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:932: bhede api yatra taj-jñānāt tat tathā pratipadyate
SA15dhkprvku:934: ity etat kārya-viśleṣasya anvayo na eka-vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:935: vastūnāṃ vidyate tasmāt tan niṣṭhā vastuni śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:939: vyatirekī iva yaj jñāne bhāty artha-pratibimbakam
SA15dhkprvku:940: śabdāt tad api na artha-ātmā bhrāntiḥ sā vāsanā-udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:941: tasya abhidhāne śrutibhir arthe ko aṃśo avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:942: tasya agatau ca saṃketa-kriyā vyarthā tad arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:943: śabdo artha-aṃśakam āha iti tatra anyāpoha ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:944: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthe asti tam vadann artha-bhāk katham
SA15dhkprvku:945: śabdasya anvayinaḥ kāryam arthena anvayinā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:948: śabda-artho arthaḥ sa eva iti vacanena virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:950: anuyānti imam artha-aṃśam iti vā apoha-kṛc śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:954: śrutau sambadhyate apoho na etad vastuni yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:955: tasmāj jāty-ādi-tad-yogā na arthe teṣu ca na śrutiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:959: anyatra gata-citto api cakṣuṣā rūpam īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:960: tat saṃketa-agrahas tatra spaṣṭas tajjā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:961: jāyante kalpanās tatra yatra śabdo niveśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:962: tena icchātaḥ pravarteran na īkṣeran bāhyam akṣajāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:963: rūpaṃ rūpam iti īkṣeta tad dhiyaṃ kim iti īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:964: asti ca anubhavas tasyāḥ so avikalpaḥ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:965: tasya eva anubhave dṛṣṭaṃ na vikalpa-dvayaṃ sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:967: smṛtir bhaved atīte ca sā agṛhīte kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:970: siddhaṃ tat kena tasmin hi na pratyakṣaṃ na laiṅgikam
SA15dhkprvku:972: rūpa-ādir iva gṛhyeta na syāt tat pūrva-dhī-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:975: sāmānya-vācinaḥ śabdās tad eka-arthā ca kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:977: asti cen nirvikalpaṃ ca kiṃcit tat-tulya-hetukam
SA15dhkprvku:978: sarvan tathā eva hetor hi bhedād bhedaḥ phala-ātmanām
SA15dhkprvku:980: tathā anapekṣya samayaṃ vastu-śaktyā eva netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:982: anapekṣya na cec śakyaṃ syāt smṛtāv eva liṅga-vat
SA15dhkprvku:983: tasyās tat-saṃgama-utpatter akṣa-dhīḥ syāt smṛter na vā
SA15dhkprvku:984: tataḥ kāla-antare api syāt kvacid vyākṣepa-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:985: krameṇa ubhaya-hetuś cet prāg eva syād abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:986: anyo akṣa-buddhi-hetuś cet smṛtis tatra apy anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:988: bhedaś ca asamito grāhyaḥ smṛtis tatra kim arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:990: tasmāc cakṣuś ca rūpāṃ ca pratītya udeti netra-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:991: sākṣāc cet jñāna-janane samartho viṣayo akṣa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:992: atha kasmād dvaya-adhīna-janma tat tena na ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:993: samīkṣya gamakatvaṃ hi vyapadeśo na gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:994: tac ca akṣa-vyapadeśe asti tad-dharmaś ca niyojyatām
SA15dhkprvku:997: saṃcitaḥ samudāyaḥ sāmānyaṃ tatra ca akṣa-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1000: uktās te saṃcitās te hi nimittāṃ jñāna-janmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1001: aṇūnāṃ sa viśeṣaś ca na antareṇa aparān aṇūn
SA15dhkprvku:1003: atha eka-āyatanatve api na anekaṃ dṛśyate sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1005: pratyuktaṃ lāghavaṃ ca atra teṣv eva krama-pātiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1006: kim na akrama-grahas tulya-kālāḥ sarvāś ca buddhayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1007: kāścit tāsv akrama-ābhāsāḥ kramavatyo aparāś ca kim
SA15dhkprvku:1009: na ekaṃ citra-pataṃga-ādi rūpaṃ vā dṛśyate katham
SA15dhkprvku:1010: citraṃ tad ekam iti ced idaṃ citrataraṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1011: na ekaṃ svabhāvaṃ citraṃ hi maṇi-rūpaṃ yathā eva tat
SA15dhkprvku:1013: tatra avayava-rūpaṃ cet kevalaṃ dṛśyate tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1014: nīla-ādīni nirasya anyac citraṃ citraṃ yad īkṣase
SA15dhkprvku:1016: nānā-arthā kramavatyā ekā kim eka-arthā akramā aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1018: tac ced anaṅgaṃ kena iyaṃ siddhā bheda-vyavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1020: arūpatvān na saṃyogaś citro bhakteś ca na āśrayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1023: nānā-arthā ekā bhavet tasmāt siddhānto apy avikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1024: vikalpayann apy eka-arthaṃ yato anyad api paśyati
SA15dhkprvku:1025: citra-avabhāseṣv artheṣu yady ekatvaṃ na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1026: sā eva tāvat kathaṃ buddhir ekā citra-avabhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1028: yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1029: kiṃ syāt sā citratā ekasyāṃ na syāt tasyāṃ matāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1030: yadi idaṃ svayam arthānāṃ rocate tatra ke vayaṃ
SA15dhkprvku:1031: tasmān na artheṣu na jñāne sthūla-bhāsas tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1032: ekatra pratiṣiddhatvād bahuṣv api na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1033: paricchedo antar anyo ayaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1035: tatra ekasya apy abhāvena dvayam apy avahīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1036: tasmāt tad eva tasya api tattvaṃ yā dvaya-śūnyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1038: tad-upaplava-bhāve ca teṣāṃ bhedo apy upaplavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1042: lakṣaṇaṃ sa ca tattvaṃ na tena apy ete vilakṣaṇāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1050: aśakya-darśanas taṃ hi pataty arthe vivecayan
SA15dhkprvku:1051: yad yathā bhāsate jñānaṃ tat tathā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1052: iti nāma eka-bhāvaḥ syāc citra-ākārasya cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1054: vivekī na vivakṣā anyad avivekī ca na īkṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1055: ko vā virodho bahavaḥ saṃjāta-atiśayāḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1056: bhaveyuḥ kāraṇaṃ buddher yadi na ātma-indriya-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1057: hetu-bhāvād ṛte na anyā grāhyatā nāma kācana
SA15dhkprvku:1058: tatra buddhir yad ābhāsā tasyās tad-grāhyam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1059: kathaṃ vā avayavī grāhyaḥ sakṛt sva-avayavaiḥ saha
SA15dhkprvku:1060: na hi go-pratyayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāsnā-ādīnām adarśane
SA15dhkprvku:1062: sampūrṇa-aṅgo na gṛhyeta sakṛn na api guṇa-ādimān
SA15dhkprvku:1064: yad aṅga-bhāvena upāttan tat tena eva hi gṛhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1066: agrahād bheda-buddhiḥ syāt paśyato apy aparāparam
SA15dhkprvku:1068: astu nāma tathā apy eṣāṃ bhavet sambandhi-saṃkaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1075: yady apy asti sitatva-ādir yādṛg indriya-gocaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1076: na so abhidhīyate śabdair jñānayo rūpa-bhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1077: eka-arthatve api buddhīnāṃ nānā-āśrayatā sa cet
SA15dhkprvku:1078: śrotṛ-ādi-cittāni idānīṃ bhinna-arthāni iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1079: jāto nāma āśrayo anyonyaḥ cetasāṃ tasya vastunaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1080: ekasya eva kuto rūpaṃ bhinna-ākāra-avabhāsi tat
SA15dhkprvku:1084: dṛśye gava-ādau jāty-ādes tad apy etena dūṣitam
SA15dhkprvku:1085: darśanāny eva bhinnāny apy ekāṃ kurvanti kalpanām
SA15dhkprvku:1089: kṣaṇikatvād atītasya darśane ca na sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1092: karmaṇy aindriyam anyad vā sādhanaṃ kim iti iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1093: sakṛd bhāvaś ca sarvāsāṃ dhiyāṃ tadbhāva-janmanām
SA15dhkprvku:1096: mano anyam eva gṛhṇāti viṣayaṃ na andhadṛk tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1098: tato anya-grahaṇe apy asya niyata-grāhyatā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1100: sahakāri bhaved artha iti ced akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1101: asataḥ prāg asāmarthyāt paścāc ca anupayogataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1102: prāgbhāvaḥ sarva-hetūnāṃ na ato arthaḥ sva-dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1103: bhinna-kālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1105: kāryaṃ hy aneka-hetutve apy anukurvad udeti yat
SA15dhkprvku:1106: tat tena arpita-tad-rūpaṃ gṛhītam iti ca ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1109: avedakāḥ parasya api te svarūpaṃ kathaṃ viduḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1113: sā arthe sati indriye yogye yathāsvam api cetasi
SA15dhkprvku:1114: dṛṣṭaṃ janma sukha-ādīnāṃ tat-tulyaṃ manasām api
SA15dhkprvku:1115: asatsu satsu ca eteṣu na janma-ajanma vā kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1116: dṛṣṭaṃ sukha-āder buddher vā ta tato na anyataś ca te
SA15dhkprvku:1119: yasya arthasya nipātena te jātā dhī-sukha-ādayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1120: taṃ muktvā pratipadyeta sukha-ādīn eva sā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1122: tal-lāghavāc cet tat-tulyam ity asaṃvedanaṃ na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1123: na ca ekayā dvaya-jñānaṃ niyamād akṣa-cetasaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1124: sukha-ādy-abhāve apy arthāc ca jāteḥ tac śakty-asiddhitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1125: pṛthak pṛthak ca sāmarthye dvayor nīla-ādi-vat sukham
SA15dhkprvku:1127: na hi saṃvedanaṃ yuktam arthena eva saha-grahe
SA15dhkprvku:1128: kiṃ sāmarthyaṃ sukha-ādīnāṃ na iṣṭā dhīr yat tad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1130: rūpa-ādiḥ stry-ādi-bhedo akṣaṇā na gṛhyeta kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:1131: na hi saty antaraṅge arthe śakter dhīr bāhya-darśanī
SA15dhkprvku:1135: saty āntare apy upādāne jñāne duḥkha-ādi-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1136: na upādānaṃ viruddhasya tac ca ekam iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1138: ādhipatyaṃ tu kurvīta tad-viruddhe api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1142: vedakāḥ svātmanaś ca eṣām arthebhyo janma kevalam
SA15dhkprvku:1143: artha-ātmā svātmabhūto hi teṣāṃ tair anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1145: kaścid bahiḥ sthitān eva sukha-ādīn apracetanān
SA15dhkprvku:1146: grāhyān āha na tasya api sakṛd yukto dvaya-grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1148: bhinna-avabhāsinor grāhyaṃ cetasos tad abhedi kim
SA15dhkprvku:1150: tāratamyaṃ ca buddhau syān na prīti-paritāpayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1152: sa idānīṃ kathaṃ bāhyaḥ sukha-ādy-ātmā iti gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1154: agrāhakaḥ syāt sarvasya tato hīyeta bhoktṛtā
SA15dhkprvku:1156: grāhyagrāhakatā-abhāvād bhāve anyatra api sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1157: tasmāt ta āntarā eva saṃvedyatvāc ca cetanāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1158: saṃvedanaṃ na yad rūpaṃ na hi tat tasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1159: atat-svabhāvo anubhavo bauddhāṃs tān samavaiti cet
SA15dhkprvku:1160: muktvā adhyakṣa-smṛta-ākārāṃ saṃvittiṃ buddhir atra kā
SA15dhkprvku:1162: ekam āvirbhavad dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tv anyad antarā
SA15dhkprvku:1165: abhinna-vedanasya aikye yan na evaṃ tad-vibheda-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1166: sidhyed asādhanatve asya na siddhaṃ bheda-sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1168: abhinna-ābhe vibhinne ced bheda-abhedau kim āśrayau
SA15dhkprvku:1171: prāguktaṃ yogināṃ jñānaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhāvanām ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1174: abhūtān api paśyanti purato avasthitān iva
SA15dhkprvku:1176: svapne api smaryate smārtaṃ ca tat tādṛg arthavat
SA15dhkprvku:1179: tasmād bhūtam abhūtaṃ vā yad yad eva abhibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1181: tatra pramāṇaṃ saṃvādi yat prāṅ nirṇīta-vastu-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1183: śabda-artha-grāhi yad yatra taj-jñānaṃ tatra kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1184: svarūpaṃ ca na śabda-arthas tatra adhyakṣam ato akhilam
SA15dhkprvku:1194: na pratyayo anuyaṃs tac ca pratyakṣāt parihīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1195: apavādaś caturtho atra tena uktam upaghātajam
SA15dhkprvku:1197: mānasaṃ tad api ity eke teṣāṃ grantho virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1198: nīla-dvi-candra-ādi-dhiyāṃ hetur akṣāṇy api ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1201: kiṃ vā aindriyaṃ yad akṣāṇāṃ bhāva-abhāva-anurodhi cet
SA15dhkprvku:1202: tat-tulyaṃ vikriyā-vac cet sā iva iyaṃ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1203: sarpa-ādi-bhrānti-vac ca asyāḥ syād akṣa-vikṛtāv api
SA15dhkprvku:1204: nivṛttir na nivarteta nivṛtte apy akṣa-viplave
SA15dhkprvku:1205: kadācid anya-santāne tathā eva apy eta vācakaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1207: suptasya jāgrato vā api yā eva dhīḥ sphuṭa-bhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1208: sā nirvikalpa-ubhayathā apy anyathā eva vikalpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1209: tasmāt tasya avikalpe api prāmāṇyaṃ pratiṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1210: visaṃvādāt tad-arthaṃ ca pratyakṣa-ābhaṃ dvidhā uditam
SA15dhkprvku:1211: kriyā-sādhanam ity eva sarvaṃ sarvasya karmaṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1212: sādhanaṃ na hi tat tasyāḥ sādhanaṃ yā kriyā yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1214: bhāvyaṃ tena ātmanā yena pratikarma vibhajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1215: anātmabhūto bhedo asya vidyamāno api hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1216: bhinne karmaṇy abhinnasya na bhedena niyāmakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1217: tasmād yato asya ātma-bhedo asya adhigatir ity ayam
SA15dhkprvku:1219: arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvā artha-rūpatām
SA15dhkprvku:1220: anyaḥ sva-bhedāj jñānasya bhedako api kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1223: sā ca tasya ātmabhūtā eva tena na artha-antaraṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1224: dadhānaṃ tac ca tām ātmany artha-adhigamana-ātmanā
SA15dhkprvku:1230: na iṣṭaṃ prāmāṇyam eteṣāṃ vyavadhānāt kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1231: sarveṣām upayoge api kārakāṇāṃ kriyāṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1232: yad antyaṃ bhedakaṃ tasyās tat-sādhakatamaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1234: tad-bhede api hy abhinnasya tasya idam iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1236: atādrūpye na bhedo api tadvad anya-dhiyo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1237: na iṣṭo viṣaya-bhedo api kriyā-sādhanayor dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1238: eka-arthatve dvayaṃ vyarthaṃ na ca syāt krama-bhāvitā
SA15dhkprvku:1241: sarva-ātmanā api sambaddhaṃ kaiścid eva avagamyate
SA15dhkprvku:1242: dharmaiḥ sa niyamo na syāt sambandhasya aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1243: tad abhede api bhedo ayaṃ yasmāt tasya pramāṇatā
SA15dhkprvku:1244: saṃskārāc ced atādrūpye na tasya apy avyavasthiteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1249: kā artha saṃvid yad eva idaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prativedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1251: atha so anubhavaḥ kva asya tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1252: sarūpavanti tat kena sthūla-ābhāsaś ca te aṇavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1257: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedam iti yatra avasāya-dhīḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1258: sa tasya anubhavaḥ sā eva pratyāsattir vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1260: tayoḥ sambandham āśritya draṣṭur eṣa viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1261: ātmā sa tasya anubhavaḥ sa ca na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1263: na anyo anubhāvyas tena asti tasya na anubhavo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1264: tasya api tulya-codyatvāt svayaṃ sā eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1265: nīla-ādi-rūpas tasya asau svabhāvo anubhavaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1268: yathā prakāśo abhimatas tathā dhīr ātma-vedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1269: tasyāś ca artha-antare vedye durghaṭau vedya-vedakau
SA15dhkprvku:1274: tadā anya-saṃvido abhāvāt svasaṃvit phalam iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1275: yadi bāhyo anubhūyeta ko doṣo na eva kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1276: idam eva kim uktaṃ syāt sa bāhyo artho anubhūyeta
SA15dhkprvku:1277: yadi buddhis tad-ākārā sā asty ākāra-niveśinī
SA15dhkprvku:1278: sā bāhyād anyato vā iti vicāram idam arhati
SA15dhkprvku:1280: darśanaṃ nīla-nirbhāsaṃ na artho bāhyo asti kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1283: tasmād dvi-rūpam asty ekaṃ yad evam anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1284: smaryate ca ubhaya-ākārasya asya saṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1285: yadā niṣpanna-tadbhāva iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1286: vijñapti-hetur viṣayas tasyāś ca anubhavas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1288: tadā ya ātma-anubhavaḥ sa eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1289: yadi iṣṭa-ākāra ātmā syād anyathā vā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1290: iṣṭo aniṣṭo api vā tena bhavaty arthaḥ praveditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1291: vidyamāne api bāhya-arthe yathānubhavam eva saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1293: yadi bāhyaṃ na vidyeta kasya saṃvedanaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1294: yady agatyā svarūpasya bāhyasya eva na kiṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1295: abhyupāye api bhedena na syād anubhavo dvayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1296: adṛṣṭa-āvaraṇān no cen na nāma-artha-vaśā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1298: tad adṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ nāma bhaved arthasya vedakam
SA15dhkprvku:1300: aniṣṭa-ādāv asandhānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatra api cetasām
SA15dhkprvku:1301: tasmāt prameye bāhye api yuktaṃ sva-anubhavaḥ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1302: yataḥ svabhāvo asya yathā tathā eva artha-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1303: tadā artha-ābhāsatā eva asya pramāṇaṃ na tu sann api
SA15dhkprvku:1305: yasmād yathā niviṣṭo asāv artha-ātmā pratyaye tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1306: niścīyate niviṣṭo asāv evam ity ātma-saṃvidaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1307: ity artha-saṃvit sā eva iṣṭā yato artha-ātmā na dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1308: tasyā buddhi-niveśya-arthaḥ sādhanaṃ tasya sā kriyā
SA15dhkprvku:1309: yathā niviśate so arthaḥ tathā hi sa prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1310: artha-sthites tadātmatvāt svavid apy arthavin matā
SA15dhkprvku:1311: tasmād viṣaya-bhedo api na svasaṃvedanaṃ phalam
SA15dhkprvku:1313: tathā avabhāsamānasya tādṛśo anya-adṛśo api vā
SA15dhkprvku:1314: jñānasya hetur artho api ity arthasya iṣṭā prameyatā
SA15dhkprvku:1315: yathā kathaṃcin na asya artha-rūpaṃ yuktyā avabhāsinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1321: dūre yathā vā maruṣu mahān alpo api dṛśyate
SA15dhkprvku:1325: satyaṃ kathaṃ syur ākārās tad ekatvasya hānitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1326: anyasya anyatva-hāneś ca na abhedo arūpa-darśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1327: rūpa-abhedaṃ hi paśyantī dhīr abhedaṃ vyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1328: bhāvā yena nirūpyante tad-rūpaṃ na asti tattvataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1329: yasmād ekam anekaṃ vā rūpaṃ teṣāṃ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1332: adarśanāj jagat yasminn ekasya api tadātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1333: asti iyam api yā tv antar upaplava-samudbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1337: tādātmyād ātmavit tasya sa tasyā sādhanaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1340: tatra apy anubhava-ātmatvāt te yogyāḥ svātmasaṃvidi
SA15dhkprvku:1341: iti sā yogyatā mānam ātmā meyaḥ phalaṃ svavit
SA15dhkprvku:1343: sā yogyatā iti ca proktaṃ pramāṇaṃ svātmavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1344: sarvam eva hi vijñānaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ samudbhavat
SA15dhkprvku:1345: tad-anyasya api hetutve kathaṃ syād viṣaya-ākṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1347: pitros tad ekasya ākāraṃ dhatte na anyasya kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1349: viṣayatvaṃ tad-aṅgena tad-abhāve na tad bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1353: sā vā anityā na jātiḥ syān nityā vā janikā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1354: nāma-ādikaṃ niṣiddhaṃ prāṅ na ayam arthavatāṃ kramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1356: smṛtiś ca īdṛgvidhaṃ jñānaṃ tasyāś ca anubhavād bhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1357: sa ca artha-ākāra-rahitaḥ sā idānīṃ tadvatī katham
SA15dhkprvku:1358: na arthād bhāvas tadā abhāvāt syāt tathā anubhave api saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1359: ākāraḥ sa ca na arthasya spaṣṭa-ākāra-vivekataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1360: vyatiriktaṃ tam ākāraṃ pratīyād aparas tathā
SA15dhkprvku:1361: nityam ātmani sambandhe pratīyāt kathitaṃ ca na
SA15dhkprvku:1362: ekā ekena abhisambandhe pratisandhir na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1365: bhinna-ātma-arthaḥ kathaṃ grāhyas tadā syād dhīr anarthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1368: anyathā hy atad-ākāraṃ kathaṃ jñāne adhirohati
SA15dhkprvku:1369: eka-ākāra-uttaraṃ jñānaṃ tathā hy uttaram uttaram
SA15dhkprvku:1370: tasya artha-rūpeṇa ākārāv ātma-ākāraś ca kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1373: bhrāntyā saṅkalanaṃ jyotir manaskāre ca sā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1374: sarveṣām api kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇaiḥ syāt tathā grahaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1377: sārūpyāt tat kim anyat syād dṛṣṭeś ca yamala-ādiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1382: anyathā hy ādyam eva ekaṃ saṃyojyeta artha-sambhavāt
SA15dhkprvku:1385: viṣayasya tato anyatvaṃ kena ākāreṇa sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:1386: bhedaś ca bhrānti-vijñānair dṛśyeta indāv iva advaye
SA15dhkprvku:1388: na artho asaṃvedanaḥ kaścid anarthasya api vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1389: dṛṣṭaṃ saṃvedyamānaṃ tat tayor na asti vivekitā
SA15dhkprvku:1392: abhāvād akṣa-buddhīnāṃ satsv apy anyeṣu hetuṣu
SA15dhkprvku:1393: niyamaṃ yadi na brūyāt pratyayāt samanantarāt
SA15dhkprvku:1397: buddhir āśritya kalpyeta yadi kiṃ vā virudhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1398: anagni-janyo dhūmaḥ syāt tat-kāryāt kāraṇe agatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1399: na syāt kāraṇatāyāṃ vā kuta ekāntato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1401: gamayed agni-nirbhāsāṃ dhiyam eva na pāvakam
SA15dhkprvku:1403: vyanakti citta-santāno dhiyaṃ dhūmo agnitas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1404: asty eṣa viduṣāṃ vādo bāhyaṃ tv āśritya varṇyate
SA15dhkprvku:1409: sarvaṃ tad-artham arthāc cet tasya na asti tad-ābhatā
SA15dhkprvku:1411: tasya kenacid aṃśena parato api bhidā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1412: tathā hy āśritya pitaraṃ tad-rūpo api sutaḥ pituḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1417: bhūtaṃ paśyaṃś ca tad-darśī kathaṃ ca upahata-indriyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1418: śodhitaṃ timireṇa asya vyaktaṃ cakṣur atīndriyam
SA15dhkprvku:1419: paśyato anya-akṣa-dṛśye arthe tad-avyaktaṃ kathaṃ punaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1421: śaktir hetus tato na anyo ahetuś ca viṣayaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1422: sa eva yadi dhī-hetuḥ kiṃ pradīpam apekṣate
SA15dhkprvku:1423: dīpa-mātreṇa sadbhāvād ubhayaṃ na api kāraṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1425: tat syād āloka-bhedāc cet tat pidhāna-apidhānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1426: tulyā dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭir vā sūkṣmo aṃśas tasya kaścana
SA15dhkprvku:1427: ālokena na mandena dṛśyate ato bhidā yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1431: bhinne anyasminn abhinnasya kuto bhedena bhāsanam
SA15dhkprvku:1432: mandaṃ tad api tejaḥ kim āvṛtter iha sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1433: tanutvāt tejaso apy etad asty anyatra apy atānavam
SA15dhkprvku:1434: atyāsanne ca suvyaktaṃ tejas tat syād atisphuṭam
SA15dhkprvku:1435: tatra apy adṛṣṭam āśritya bhaved rūpa-antaraṃ yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1436: anyonya-āvaraṇāt teṣāṃ syāt tejo vihatis tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1437: tatra ekam eva dṛśyeta tasya anāvaraṇe sakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1438: paśyet sphuṭa-asphuṭaṃ rūpam eko adṛṣṭena vāraṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1439: artha-anarthau na yena stas tad-adṛṣṭaṃ karoti kim
SA15dhkprvku:1444: vyaktiḥ kuto asatāṃ jñānād anyasya anupakāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1445: vyaktau vyajyeta sarvo arthas tad-hetor niyamo yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1446: na eṣā api kalpanā jñāne jñānaṃ tv artha-avabhāsataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1447: taṃ vyanakti iti kathyeta tad-abhāve api tat-kṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1448: na ākārayati ca anyo artho anupakārāt saha-uditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1449: vyakto na ākārayan jñānaṃ sva-ākāreṇa kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1450: vajra-upala-ādir apy arthaḥ sthiraḥ so anya-anapekṣaṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:1451: sakṛt sarvasya janayej jñānāni jagataḥ samam
SA15dhkprvku:1453: āhuḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ bhedaṃ sa doṣo atra api pūrvavat
SA15dhkprvku:1454: saṃvedanasya tādātmye na vivādo asti kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:1455: tasya artha-rūpatā siddhā sā api sidhyati saṃsmṛteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1457: evam etan na khalv evam iti sā syān na bhedinī
SA15dhkprvku:1458: na ca anubhava-mātreṇa kaścid bhedo vivecakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1459: vivekinī na ca aspaṣṭa-bhede dhīr yamala-ādi-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1462: dhiyā atadrūpayā jñāne niruddhe anubhavaḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1463: svaṃ ca rūpaṃ na sā vetti ity utsanno anubhavo arthinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1464: bahir mukhaṃ ca taj-jñānaṃ bhāty artha-pratibhāsa-vat
SA15dhkprvku:1465: buddheś ca grāhikā buddhir nityam antarmukhā-ātmani
SA15dhkprvku:1466: yo yasya viṣaya-ābhāsas taṃ vetti na tad ity api
SA15dhkprvku:1467: prāptā kā saṃvid anyā asti tādrūpyād iti cen matam
SA15dhkprvku:1469: buddhiḥ sarūpā tad-vic cet na idānīṃ vit-sarūpikā
SA15dhkprvku:1470: svayaṃ so anubhavas tasyā na sa sārūpya-kāraṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1474: dhiyo nīla-ādi-rūpatve bāhyo arthaḥ kiṃ pramāṇakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1475: dhiyo anīla-ādi-rūpatve sa tasya anubhavaḥ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1477: siddhaṃ tat svata eva asya kim arthena upanīyate
SA15dhkprvku:1478: sarvātmanā hi sārūpye jñānam ajñānatāṃ vrajet
SA15dhkprvku:1479: sāmye kenacid aṅgena syāt sarvaṃ sarva-vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1481: tathā anubhava-rūpatvāt tasya apy anubhavo bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1482: na anubhūto anubhava ity artha-vat tad-viniścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1483: tasmād adoṣa iti cet na arthe apy asty eṣa sarvadā
SA15dhkprvku:1484: kasmād vā anubhave na asti sati sattā-nibandhane
SA15dhkprvku:1485: api ca idaṃ yad ābhāti dṛśyamāne sita-ādike
SA15dhkprvku:1487: tat kiṃ sita-ādy-abhivyakteḥ pararūpam atha ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1488: pararūpe aprakāśāyāṃ vyaktau vyaktaṃ kathaṃ sitam
SA15dhkprvku:1489: jñānaṃ vyaktir na sā vyaktā ity avyaktam akhilaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:1491: dṛṣṭyā ca ajñāta-sambandhaṃ viśinaṣṭi tayā katham
SA15dhkprvku:1492: yasmād dvayor eka-gatau na dvitīyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1493: dvayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayor dṛṣṭau syād dṛṣṭam iti niścayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1494: sarūpaṃ darśanaṃ yasya dṛśyate anyena cetasā
SA15dhkprvku:1495: dṛṣṭa-ākhyā tatra cet siddhaṃ sārūpye asya svavedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1496: atha ātma-rūpan no vetti pararūpasya vit katham
SA15dhkprvku:1497: sārūpyād vedanā-ākhyā ca prāg eva pratipāditā
SA15dhkprvku:1498: dṛṣṭayor eva sārūpya-graho arthaṃ ca na dṛṣṭavān
SA15dhkprvku:1499: prāk kathaṃ darśanena asya sārūpyaṃ so adhyavasyati
SA15dhkprvku:1500: sārūpyam api na icched yaḥ tasya na ubhaya-darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1501: tadā artho jñānam iti ca jñāte ca iti gatā kathā
SA15dhkprvku:1502: atha svarūpaṃ sā tarhi svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1503: yat tasyām aprakāśāyām arthaḥ syād aprakāśitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1505: apratyakṣāṃ dhiyaṃ prāhus te api nirvarṇita-uttarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1508: pratyakṣās tad-viviktaṃ ca na anyat kiṃcid vibhāvyate
SA15dhkprvku:1509: yat taj-jñānam paro apy enāṃ bhuñjīta anyena vid yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1510: tajjā tat pratibhāsā vā yadi dhīr vetti na aparā
SA15dhkprvku:1511: ālambamānasya anyasya apy asty avaśyam idaṃ dvayam
SA15dhkprvku:1512: atha na utpadyate tasmān na ca tat pratibhāsinī
SA15dhkprvku:1513: sā dhīrn nirviṣayā prāptā sāmānyaṃ ca tad-agrahe
SA15dhkprvku:1514: na gṛhyata iti proktaṃ na ca tad-vastu kiṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1515: tasmād artha-avabhāso asau na anyas tasyā dhiyas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1517: na adhyakṣam iti ced eṣa kuto bhedaḥ samarthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1519: sarvathā anyo na gṛhṇīyāt saṃvid bhedo apy apoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1520: yeṣāṃ ca yogino anyasya pratyakṣeṇa sukha-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1521: vidanti tulya-anubhavās tadvat te api syur āturāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1523: na udeti duḥkham iti cet na vai duḥkha-samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1526: bhāsamānaṃ svarūpeṇa pīḍā duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ yadā
SA15dhkprvku:1527: na tad-ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na tadā evaṃ prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1529: artha-sārūpyam ālamba ātmā vittiḥ svayaṃ sphuṭaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1530: api ca adhyakṣatā abhāve dhiyaḥ syāl liṅgato gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1531: tac ca akṣam artho dhīḥ pūrvo manaskāro api vā bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1534: tathā artho dhī-manaskārau jñānaṃ tau ca na sidhyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1535: na aprasiddhasya liṅgatvaṃ vyaktir arthasya cen matā
SA15dhkprvku:1536: liṅgaṃ sā eva nanu jñānaṃ vyakto artho anena varṇitaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1538: atha arthasya eva kaścit sa viśeṣo vyaktir iṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1540: tad iṣṭau vā pratijñānaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1541: sa ca jñāto athavā ajñāto bhavej jñātasya liṅgatā
SA15dhkprvku:1542: yadi jñāte aparicchinne jñāto asāv iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1543: jñātatvena aparicchinnam api tad gamakaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1544: adṛṣṭa-dṛṣṭayo anyena draṣṭā dṛṣṭā na hi kvacit
SA15dhkprvku:1545: viśeṣaḥ so anya-dṛṣṭāv apy asti iti syāt sva-dhī-gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1547: kevalān na artha-dharmāt kaḥ sva-dharmaḥ sva-dhiyo paraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1549: tasya bhedaḥ kuto buddher vyabhicāry-anyajaś ca saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1551: muktvā na kāryam aparaṃ tasyāḥ samupalabhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1552: tatra atyakṣaṃ dvayaṃ pañcasv artheṣv eko api na īkṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1554: yad evam apratītaṃ tal liṅgam ity apy alaukikam
SA15dhkprvku:1555: vidyamāne api liṅge tāṃ tena sārdham apaśyataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1556: kathaṃ pratīti-liṅgaṃ hi na adṛṣṭasya prakāśakam
SA15dhkprvku:1557: tata eva asya liṅgāt prāk prasiddher upavarṇane
SA15dhkprvku:1559: ity arthasya dhiyaḥ siddhiḥ na arthāt tasyāḥ kathaṃcana
SA15dhkprvku:1561: pratyakṣāṃ ca dhiyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāś ca iṣṭa-abhidhā-ādikam
SA15dhkprvku:1562: para-citta-anumānaṃ ca na syād ātmany adarśanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1564: prakāśitā kathaṃ vā syāt buddhir buddhy-antareṇa vaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1567: sa ca prakāśas tad-rūpaḥ svayam eva prakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1568: tathā abhyupagame buddheḥ buddhau buddhiḥ svavedikā
SA15dhkprvku:1569: siddhā anyathā tulya-dharmā viṣayo api dhiyā saha
SA15dhkprvku:1570: iti prakāśa-rūpā naḥ svayaṃ dhīḥ samprakāśate
SA15dhkprvku:1572: sādṛśye api hi dhīr anyā prakāśyā na tayā matā
SA15dhkprvku:1577: tasmād yato ayaṃ tasya api vācyam anyasya darśanam
SA15dhkprvku:1578: smṛter apy ātmavit siddhā jñānasya anyena vedane
SA15dhkprvku:1581: varṇaḥ syād akramo dīrghaḥ kramavān akramāṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1583: akrameṇa grahād anta-krama-vad dhīś ca no bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1584: āntyaṃ pūrva-sthitād ūrdhvaṃ vardhamāno dhvanir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1585: sthāne svayaṃ na naśyet sā paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1587: sakṛd yatna-udbhavād vyarthaḥ syād yatnaś ca uttarottaraḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1588: vyaktāv apy eṣa varṇānāṃ doṣaḥ samanuṣajyate
SA15dhkprvku:1589: anekayā tad-grahaṇe yā antyā dhīḥ sā anubhūyate
SA15dhkprvku:1590: na dīrgha-grāhikā sā ca tan na syād dīrgha-dhī-smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1591: pṛthak pṛthak ca buddhīnāṃ saṃvittau tad-dhvaniḥ śruteḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1592: avicchinna-ābhatā na syād ghaṭanaṃ ca nirākṛtam
SA15dhkprvku:1593: vicchinnaṃ śṛṇvato apy asya yady avicchinna-vibhramaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1599: eka-aṇv-atyaya-kālaś ca kālo alpīyān kṣaṇo mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1600: buddhiś ca kṣaṇikā tasmāt kramād varṇān prapadyate
SA15dhkprvku:1602: vicchinnā apy anyayā buddhiḥ sarvā syād vitatha-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1603: ghaṭanaṃ yac ca bhāvānām anyatra indriya-vibhramāt
SA15dhkprvku:1606: na akṣa-grāhye asti śabdānāṃ yojanā iti vivecitam
SA15dhkprvku:1607: vicchinnaṃ paśyato apy akṣair ghaṭayed yadi kalpanā
SA15dhkprvku:1608: arthasya tat saṃvitteś ca satataṃ bhāsamānayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1609: bādhake asati san nyāye vicchinna iti tat kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1610: buddhīnāṃ śakti-niyamād iti cet sa kuto mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1611: yugapad buddhy-adṛṣṭeś cet tad eva idaṃ vicāryate
SA15dhkprvku:1613: tathā hi samyak lakṣyante vikalpāḥ krama-bhāvinaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1615: spaṣṭa-avabhāsāaṃ pratyakṣāṃ kalpayet so api vāritaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1617: pratīta-bhede apy adhyakṣā dhīḥ kathaṃ tādṛśī bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1620: sa eva ayam iti jñānaṃ na asti tac ca akṣaje kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1621: na ca artha-jñāna-saṃvittyor yugapat sambhavo yataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1622: lakṣyate pratibhāsau dvau na artha-artha-jñānayoḥ pṛthak
SA15dhkprvku:1623: na hy artha-ābhāsi ca jñānam artho bāhyaś ca kevalaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1625: sūpalakṣyeṇa bhedena yau saṃvittau na lakṣitau
SA15dhkprvku:1626: artha-artha-pratyayau paścāt smaryete tau pṛthak katham
SA15dhkprvku:1630: na hi saṃvedanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhaved arthasya vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1631: tathā hi nīla-ādy-ākāra eka ekaṃ ca vedanam
SA15dhkprvku:1632: lakṣyate na tu nīla-ābhe vedane vedanaṃ param
SA15dhkprvku:1633: jñāna-antareṇa anubhavo bhavet tatra api ca smṛtiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1634: dṛṣṭā tad-vedanaṃ kena tasya apy anyena ced imām
SA15dhkprvku:1635: mālāṃ jñāna-vidāṃ ko ayaṃ janayaty anubandhinīm
SA15dhkprvku:1636: pūrvā dhīḥ sā eva cen na syāt saṃcāro viṣaya-antare
SA15dhkprvku:1638: agṛhītvā uttaraṃ jñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād aparaṃ katham
SA15dhkprvku:1639: ātmani jñāna-janane svabhāve niyatāṃ ca tām
SA15dhkprvku:1640: ko nāma anyo vibadhnīyād bahir-aṅge antaraṅgikām
SA15dhkprvku:1641: bāhyaḥ saṃnihito apy arthaḥ tāṃ vibandhuṃ hi na prabhuḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1642: dhiyaṃ na anubhavet kaścid anyathā arthasya saṃnidhau
SA15dhkprvku:1643: na ca saṃnihita-arthā asti daśā kācid ato dhiyaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1644: utsanna-mūlā smṛtir apy utsannā ity ujjvalaṃ matam
SA15dhkprvku:1648: viṣaya-antara-saṃcāro yadi sā eva artha-dhīḥ kutaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1649: śakti-kṣaye pūrva-dhiyaḥ na hi dhīḥ prāg dhiyā vinā
SA15dhkprvku:1653: na apekṣeta anyathā sāmyaṃ mano-vṛtter mano antaram
SA15dhkprvku:1655: ekatvān manaso anyasmin saktasya anya-agater yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1657: samavṛttau ca tulyatvāt sarvadā anya-agatir bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1658: janma ca ātma-mano yoga-mātrajānāṃ sakṛd bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1659: ekā eva cet kriyā ekaḥ syāt kiṃ dīpo aneka-darśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1660: krameṇa api na śaktaṃ syāt paścād apy aviśeṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1661: anena deha puruṣāv uktau saṃskārato yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1662: niyamaḥ sa kutaḥ paścād buddheś ced astu sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:1663: na grāhyatā anyā jananāj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇam
SA15dhkprvku:1664: agrāhyaṃ na hi tejo asti na ca saukṣmya-ādy-anaṃśake
SA15dhkprvku:1666: grāhyatāyā na khalv anyaj jananaṃ grāhya-lakṣaṇe
SA15dhkprvku:1667: sākṣān na hy anyathā buddhe rūpa-ādir upakārakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1669: buddher api tad asti iti sā api tattve vyavasthitā
SA15dhkprvku:1671: rūpa-ādeś cetasaś ca evam aviśuddha-dhiyaṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1674: rūpa-ādi-buddheḥ kiṃ jātaṃ paścād yat prāṅ na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:1675: sati sva-dhī-grahe tasmāt sā eva anantara-hetutā
SA15dhkprvku:1676: cetaso grāhyatā sā eva tato na artha-antarā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1678: prakṛtyā eva iti gaditaṃ nānā-ekasmān na ced bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1679: na kiṃcid ekam ekasmāt sāmagryāḥ sarva-sambhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1680: ekaṃ syād api sāmagrayor ity uktaṃ tad anekakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1681: arthaṃ pūrvaṃ ca vijñānaṃ gṛhṇīyād yadi dhīḥ parā
SA15dhkprvku:1684: dvir dvir ekaṃ ca bhāseta bhāsanād ātma-tad-vidoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1687: ātma-anubhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na anubhūtaṃ parair yadi
SA15dhkprvku:1688: ātma-anubhūtiḥ sā siddhā kṛto yena evam ucyate
SA15dhkprvku:1689: vyakti-hetv-aprasiddhiḥ syān na vyakter vyaktam icchataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1690: vyakty-asiddhāv api vyaktaṃ yadi vyaktam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:1691: parasya pratipādyatvād adṛṣṭo api svayaṃ paraiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1692: dṛṣṭaḥ sādhanam ity eke tat-kṣepāya ātma-dṛg-vacaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1694: vācaḥ prāmāṇyam asmin hi na anumānaṃ pravartate
SA15dhkprvku:1695: bādhanāya āgamasya ukteḥ sādhanasya paraṃ prati
SA15dhkprvku:1696: so apramāṇaṃ tadā asiddhaṃ tat-siddham akhilaṃ tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1697: tad-āgamavataḥ siddhaṃ yadi kasya ka āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1698: bādhyamānaḥ pramāṇena sa siddhaḥ katham āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1699: tad-viruddha-abhyupagamas tena eva ca kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1701: tat kasmāt sādhanaṃ na uktaṃ sva-pratītir yad udbhavā
SA15dhkprvku:1702: yuktyā yayā āgamo grāhyo grāhikā asya api sā na kim
SA15dhkprvku:1704: sādhanaiḥ sādhanāny artha-śakti-jñāne asya tāny alam
SA15dhkprvku:1705: vicchinna-anugamā ye ca sāmānyena apy agocarāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1706: sādhya-sādhana-cintā asti na teṣv artheṣu kācana
SA15dhkprvku:1709: sann artho jñāna-sāpekṣo na asan jñānena sādhakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1710: sato api vastv-asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃgatyā sadṛśī gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1711: liṅgaṃ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ vā dṛśya-adarśanam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:1712: sambaddhaṃ vastutaḥ siddhaṃ tad asiddhaṃ kim ātmanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1713: pareṇa apy anyato gantum ayuktaṃ para-kalpitaiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1718: vastunaś ca anyathā abhāvāt kalpitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1720: na arthe tena tayorn na asti svataḥ sādhana-saṃsthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1722: pramāṇaṃ saṃśaya-utpatteḥ tataḥ sākṣān na sādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1723: sādhyasya eva abhidhānena pāraṃparyeṇa na apy alam
SA15dhkprvku:1724: śaktasya sūcakaṃ hetu-vaco aśaktam api svayam
SA15dhkprvku:1726: śaktis tasya api ced hetu-vacanasya pravartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:1728: vipakṣa-upagame apy etat tulyam ity anavasthitiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1729: antaraṅgaṃ tu sāmarthyaṃ triṣu rūpeṣu saṃsthitam
SA15dhkprvku:1732: viṣaya-khyāpanād eva siddhau cet tasya śaktatā
SA15dhkprvku:1733: vyāpti-pūrve vinā apy asmāt kṛtakaḥ śabda īdṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1734: sarve anityā iti prokte apy arthāt tan nāśa-dhīr bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:1736: triṣv anyatam arūpasya eva anuktir nyūnatā uditā
SA15dhkprvku:1737: sādhya-uktiṃ vā pratijñāṃ sa vadan doṣair na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:1741: siddha-ukteḥ sādhanatvāc cet parasya api na duṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:1744: asambaddhā tathā hy eṣa na nyāya iti sūcitam
SA15dhkprvku:1748: anukto api icchayā vyāptaḥ sādhya ātma-artha-van mataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1750: vṛttau svayaṃ śruteḥ prāha kṛtā ca eṣā tad-arthikā
SA15dhkprvku:1752: anuktāv api vāñchāyā bhavet prakaraṇād gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1753: ananvayo api dṛṣṭānte doṣas tasya yathoditaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1754: ātmā paraś cet so asiddha iti tatra iṣṭa-ghātakṛt
SA15dhkprvku:1755: sādhanaṃ yad vivāde na nyastaṃ tac cen na sādhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1756: kiṃ sādhyam anyathā aniṣṭaṃ bhaved vaiphalyam eva vā
SA15dhkprvku:1758: etena kathite sādhyaṃ sāmānyena atha sammatam
SA15dhkprvku:1759: tad eva artha-antara-abhāvād deha-anāptau na sidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:1760: vācyaṃ śūnyaṃ pralapatāṃ tad etaj jāḍya-cintitam
SA15dhkprvku:1761: tulyaṃ nāśe api cec śabda-ghaṭa-bhedena kalpane
SA15dhkprvku:1762: na siddhena vināśena tadvataḥ sādhanād dhvaneḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1763: tathā artha-antara-bhāve syāt tadvān kumbho apy anityatā
SA15dhkprvku:1764: viśiṣṭā dhvaninā anveti no cen na ayoga-vāraṇāt
SA15dhkprvku:1766: vyavacchedād ayoge tu na anyena ananvaya-āgamaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:1767: sāmānyam eva tat sādhyaṃ na ca siddha-prasādhanam
SA15dhkprvku:1768: viśiṣṭaṃ dharmiṇā tac ca na niranvaya-doṣavat
SA15dhkprvku:1772: sādhyaṃ yatas tathā na iṣṭaṃ sādhyo dharmo atra kevalaḥ

SA15dhkprvku:2133: na iti sā eva nivṛttiḥ kiṃ nivṛtter asato matā
SA15dhkprvku:2134: nivṛtty-abhāvas tu vidhir vastu-bhāvo asato api san
SA15dhkprvku:2135: vastv-abhāvas tu na asti iti paśya bāndhya-vijṛmbhitam
SA15dhkprvku:2136: nivṛttir yadi tasmin na hetor vṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2137: sā api na pratiṣedho ayaṃ nivṛttiḥ kiṃ niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2138: vidhānaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ ca muktvā śābdo asti na aparaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2139: vyavahāraḥ sa ca asatsu na iti prāptā atra mūkatā
SA15dhkprvku:2140: satāṃ ca na niṣedho asti so asatsu ca na vidyate
SA15dhkprvku:2141: jagaty anena nyāyena nañ-arthaḥ pralayaṃ gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2142: deśa-kāla-niṣedhaś ced yathā asti sa niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2143: na tathā na yathā so asti tathā api na niṣidhyate
SA15dhkprvku:2146: tābhyāṃ sa dharmī sambaddhaḥ khyāty-abhāve api tādṛśaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2147: śabda-pravṛtter asti iti so api iṣṭo vyavahāra-bhāk
SA15dhkprvku:2153: vidhāv ekasya tad-bhājām iva anyeṣām upekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2154: niṣedhe tad-viviktaṃ ca tad anyeṣām apekṣakam
SA15dhkprvku:2158: tat-phalo atat-phalaś ca artho bhinna ekas tatas tataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2161: dṛṣṭiṃ bheda-āśrayais te api tasmād ajñāta-viplavāḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2162: sattā-sādhana-vṛtteś ca sandigdhaḥ syād asan na saḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2163: asattvaṃ ca abhyupagamād apramāṇān na yujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2167: dvairāśye saty adṛṣṭe api syād adṛṣṭeṣu saṃśayaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2170: bhāve virodhasya adṛṣṭau kaḥ sandehaṃ nivartayet
SA15dhkprvku:2171: kvacid viniyamāt ko anyas tat-kārya-ātmatayā sa ca
SA15dhkprvku:2172: nairātmyād api tena asya sandigdhaṃ vinivartanam
SA15dhkprvku:2173: astu nāma tathā apy ātmā na anairātmyāt prasidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2174: yena asau vyatirekasya na abhāvaṃ bhāvam icchati
SA15dhkprvku:2175: yathā na avyatireke api prāṇa-ādirn na sapakṣataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2176: sapakṣa-avyatirekī ced hetur hetur ato anvayī
SA15dhkprvku:2177: na anvayy avyatirekī ced anairātmyaṃ na sātmakam
SA15dhkprvku:2178: yan nāntarīyakaḥ svātmā yasya siddhaḥ pravṛttiṣu
SA15dhkprvku:2179: nivartakaḥ sa eva ataḥ pravṛttau ca pravartakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2181: kārye dṛṣṭir adṛṣṭiś ca kāryakāraṇatā hi te
SA15dhkprvku:2185: tair vinā bhavato anyasmāt tajjaṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2187: sā cen na bhedikā prāptam eka-rūpam idaṃ jagat
SA15dhkprvku:2190: tat tasya ajananaṃ rūpam anyasya yadi sā eva sā
SA15dhkprvku:2191: na tasya ajananaṃ rūpaṃ tat tasyāḥ sambhavet katham
SA15dhkprvku:2193: tasmāt sva-dṛṣṭāv iva tad dṛṣṭe kārye api gamyate
SA15dhkprvku:2195: drava-śakter yataḥ kledaḥ sā tv ekā eva dvayor api
SA15dhkprvku:2196: bhinna-abhinnaḥ kim asya ātmā bhinno atha dravatā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2197: abhinnā ity ucyate buddhes tad-rūpāyā abhedataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2199: yena aṃśena adadhad dhūmaṃ tena aṃśena tathā gatiḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2201: dhūmo atad-vyabhicāri iti siddhaṃ kāryaṃ tathā param
SA15dhkprvku:2203: anagniś ced adhūmo asau sadhūmaś cet sapāvakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2209: siddha-udāharaṇā ity ukta-anupalabdhiḥ pṛthag na tu
SA15dhkprvku:2210: tatra apy adṛśyāt puruṣāt prāṇa-āder anivartanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2213: vastuny api tu pūrvābhyāṃ paryudāso vidhānataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2214: tatra upalabhyeṣv astitvam upalabdher na ca aparam
SA15dhkprvku:2218: tathā anyā na upalabhyeṣu na astitā anupalambhanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2220: siddho hi vyavahāro ayaṃ dṛśya-adṛṣṭāv asann iti
SA15dhkprvku:2221: tasyāḥ siddhāv asandigdhau tat-kāryatve api dhī-dhvanī
SA15dhkprvku:2222: vidyamāne hi viṣaye mohād atra ananubruvan
SA15dhkprvku:2229: buddher upalabhe vā iti kalpikāyāḥ samudbhavaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2230: viśeṣo gamyate arthānāṃ viśiṣṭād eva vedanāt
SA15dhkprvku:2232: tasmāt svato dhiyor bheda-siddhis tābhyāṃ tad-arthayoḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2233: anyathā hy anavasthānād bhedaḥ sidhyen na kasyacit
SA15dhkprvku:2236: tasmād anupalambho ayaṃ svayaṃ pratyakṣato gataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2241: yathā aliṅgo anya-sattveṣu vikalpa-ādir na sidhyati
SA15dhkprvku:2242: aniścaya-phalā hy eṣā na alaṃ vyāvṛtti-sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2243: ādyā adhikriyate hetor niścayena eva sādhane
SA15dhkprvku:2244: tasyāḥ svayaṃ prayogeṣu svarūpaṃ vā prayujyate
SA15dhkprvku:2250: nāśanaṃ janayitvā anyaṃ sa hetus tasya nāśanaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2251: tam eva naśvaraṃ bhāvaṃ janayed yadi kiṃ bhavet
SA15dhkprvku:2252: ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tasya siddha-ātmanaḥ sataḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2253: na ātma-upakārakaḥ kaḥ syāt tena yaḥ samapekṣyate
SA15dhkprvku:2254: anapekṣaś ca kiṃ bhāvo atathābhūtaḥ kadācana
SA15dhkprvku:2255: yathā na kṣepa-bhāg iṣṭaḥ sa eva udbhūta-nāśakaḥ
SA15dhkprvku:2256: kṣaṇam apy anapekṣatve bhāvo bhāvasya na iti cet
SA15dhkprvku:2257: bhāvo hi sa tathābhūto abhāve bhāvas tathā katham
SA15dhkprvku:2263: prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva sva-dehe jarām
